doc.previous: In most of the Limburgish dialects spoken to the southeast of Panningenâfor example those of Roermond, Sittard and Heerlenâ[Ê] appears at the beginning of words in the consonant clusters sp, st, sl, sm, sn and zw. The same sound is realized as [s] elsewhere (e.g. sjtraot/straot, "street"). This is not the case, however, in the dialects of for example Venlo, Weert, Maastricht, Echt, Montfort and Posterholt.
